comment.author: 29350288@N06
comment._content: No one else has commented that he looks startlingly like Rowan Atkinson in this photo. Did he throw Bean balls? ...Sorry :-) Wikipedia: Home Run Baker.

comment.author: 43758249@N08
comment._content: Rowan Atkinson, yes.  You're right.  But there's also something about his face that reminds me of George Harrison of the Beatles.
